content.description: Ecological overshoot occurs when a population’s demand on an ecosystem exceeds the biocapacity of that ecosystem to regenerate the resources that are consumed and to absorb wastes.
content.question: Based on the graph above, in which of the following periods did the human population first exceed Earth’s biocapacity?

skill.text: Skill 5.E: Explain what the data implies or illustrates about environmental issues.
